Session Mode allows you to record voice/audio annotations in sessions, and time-stamps relative to the beginning of the session.

Click 'Document New Session' to create a new session and record annotations. You may also click on an existing session to review its annotations, or long-press for more options.

You can use the MENU to switch to Simple Mode.
Click below to document a new session.\n\n Use the menu to access instructions, adjust settings, or to switch to Simple Mode (Simple Mode has a simpler playback/recording interface).

Simple Mode offers easy recording and playback of sound files.

Use the record button to start / stop recording. Click on a recording to listen. Long-press to edit the recording's label, e-mail it, or delete it.

Use the MENU to e-mail all of the recordings or to switch to Session Mode.
